T02D3068:150b-0: @150b dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung ngo //
T02D3068:150b-1: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o //
T02D3068:150b-2: mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnam ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o //
T02D3068:150b-5: dpung gnyen ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten la skyabs dang /
T02D3068:150b-7: dpung gnyen du gyur cig / bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid //
T02D3068:150b-8: thob nas nyes ba'i dgra rnams pham byas te //
T02D3068:150b-9: rga nad 'chi ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi //
T02D3068:150b-10: srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par bgyi //
T02D3068:150b-11: des na bdag sbyin pa stsol ba dang /
T02D3068:150b-15: bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa dang /
T02D3068:150b-16: shes rab rnam par dpyod pa dang /
T02D3068:150b-17: thabs mkhas pa la slob pa ci yang rung ste /
T02D3068:150b-18: de thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du /
T02D3068:150b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te /
T02D3068:150b-22: da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D3068:150b-23: chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa theg
T02D3068:150b-24: pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa /
T02D3068:150b-25: sa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go //
T02D3068:150b-26: 'phags pa dag bdag byang chub sems dpa' lags par bzung du gsol /
T02D3068:150b-27: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T02D3068:150b-28: rtsi dang nags kyi shing lta bur //
T02D3068:150b-29: rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyis //
T02D3068:150b-30: 'dod dgur rtag tu spyod par shog / mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
T02D3068:150b-31: thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang //
T02D3068:150b-32: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D3068:150b-33: nad rnams gso bar bgyid gyur cig / sems can
T02D3068:150b-34: thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig mgan 'gro dag
T02D3068:150b-35: ni rtag tu stong par shog / byang chub sems
T02D3068:150b-36: dpa' gang dag sar bzhugs pa /
T02D3068:150b-37: de dag kun gyis smon lam 'grub gyur cig / de ltar lan gsum du'o //
T02D3068:150b-38: de ltar bla ma dam par nam la phyag 'tshal zhing /
T02D3068:150b-40: byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams dang /
T02D3068:150b-41: dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa nas bsgrags shing /
T02D3068:151a-1: mchod rten tshul bzhin bgyis te mchod pa la sogs
T02D3068:151a-2: pa dge ba rlabs po che dag gi stobs kyis
T02D3068:151a-3: / phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D3068:151a-4: 'das thams cad bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum
T02D3068:151a-5: / tshogs pa / mthar phyin par mdzad pa'i dgongs
T02D3068:151a-6: pa lhun gyis grub par gyur cig / pho brang
T02D3068:151a-7: gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bzang po spyod pa'i
T02D3068:151a-8: mchod pa'i sprin rgyas pas klubs par gyur cig /
T02D3068:151a-9: dam pa'i chos rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas
T02D3068:151a-10: 'jig rten thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur
T02D3068:151a-11: / tshogs pa / te / yi ge bris pa dang /
T02D3068:151a-19: bsgom pa mngon du byed pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba
T02D3068:151a-20: thams cad kyi rgyud la gnas par gyur cig /
T02D3068:151a-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad so so'i rnam par
T02D3068:151a-22: thar pa yongs su rdzogs shing /
T02D3068:151a-23: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang
T02D3068:151a-24: myur du thob par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi
T02D3068:151a-25: zhing tha dad pa rnams su thogs pa med par
T02D3068:151a-26: 'jug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing /
T02D3068:151a-27: bka' lung yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
T02D3068:151a-28: sems can gyi don dpag tu med pa yongs su
T02D3068:151a-29: rdzogs par bgyi ba la yo byad kyis kyang mi
T02D3068:151a-30: bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang /
T02D3068:151a-31: mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du 'byor par gyur
T02D3068:151a-32: cig /'phags pa rang rgyal dang nyan thos thams cad
T02D3068:151a-33: so so'i rnam par thar pa mthar phyin nas theg
T02D3068:151a-34: pa bla na med pa'i sgor gzhol zhing bsgrubs te
T02D3068:151a-35: / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang myur
T02D3068:151a-36: du thob par gyur cig /'phags pa dam pa'i chos
T02D3068:151a-37: skyong ba thams cad rang gi 'khor yongs su smin
T02D3068:151a-39: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i mthu dpal dang /
T02D3068:151a-40: thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing
T02D3068:151a-41: thugs dam rlabs po che thams cad yongs su bskang
T02D3068:151a-42: ba dang lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang thob pa dang
T02D3068:151a-43: / so so'i rnam par thar pa myur du rdzogs
T02D3068:151a-44: shing chos kyi mnga' bdag chen po sangs rgyas bcom
T02D3068:151a-45: ldan 'das kyi go 'phang yang myur du thob par
T02D3068:151a-46: gyur cig / che ge mo pha spun 'khor dang
T02D3068:151a-47: bcas pa la g-yo med par lhag par 'go zhing
T02D3068:151b-0: phan 'dogs pa'i lha mgon thams cad lus @151b dang
T02D3068:151b-1: sems kyi rgyud kyi sdig pa dang /
T02D3068:151b-2: nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral te /
T02D3068:151b-3: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D3068:151b-4: legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par gyur
T02D3068:151b-5: cig / dkon mchog bla na med pa gsum po
T02D3068:151b-6: la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing byang
T02D3068:151b-7: chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa yongs su rdzogs
T02D3068:151b-8: par bsgrubs nas / rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi go
T02D3068:151b-9: 'phang mchog dam pa myur du thob par gyur cig
T02D3068:151b-11: phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa la mthu dang /
T02D3068:151b-12: thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
T02D3068:151b-13: mu med mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang
T02D3068:151b-14: sgrib pa thams cad ni byang /
T02D3068:151b-15: sdug bsngal dang gnod pa thams cad ni zhi /
T02D3068:151b-16: byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs te /
T02D3068:151b-17: 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad spangs nas rnam pa thams
T02D3068:151b-18: cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa g-yung drung
T02D3068:151b-19: gi sku myur du thob par gyur cig / de
T02D3068:151b-20: ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che thams cad
T02D3068:151b-21: ma lus pa 'phags pa thams cad la phul ba
T02D3068:151b-22: dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bstabs shing bsngos pa la sogs pas /
T02D3068:151b-23: che ge mos thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba
T02D3068:151b-24: nas 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa'i
T02D3068:151b-25: stobs dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
T02D3068:151b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02D3068:151b-27: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D3068:151b-28: gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po dang /
T02D3068:151b-29: 'dus pa chen po rin po che'i tog dang /
T02D3068:151b-30: gtsug na rin po che dang /
T02D3068:151b-31: kun nas sgor 'jug ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri
T02D3068:151b-32: ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D3068:151b-33: cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par
T02D3068:151b-34: blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa theg
T02D3068:151b-35: pa chen po'i mdo sde dang /
T02D3068:151b-36: gzungs zab cing rgya che ba mthu bsam gyis mi
T02D3068:151b-37: khyab pa dang ldan pa rnams mchod de bklags nas
T02D3068:151b-38: / chos kyi sku'i mchod rten tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang /
T02D3068:151b-39: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis mdo
T02D3068:151b-40: sde dang gzungs las phan yon ji skad bka' stsal
T02D3068:151b-41: pa thams cad che ge mos 'phral du thob cing
T02D3068:152a-1: du gyur cig / che ge mos thog ma ma
T02D3068:152a-2: mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas 'gro ba brgyud pa rnams
T02D3068:152a-3: su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib par
T02D3068:152a-4: 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dbang gis byung
T02D3068:152a-10: rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'am chos kyis phongs par
T02D3068:152a-11: gyur pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa las gang gis
T02D3068:152a-12: / che ge mo ngan song gsum du mchi bar 'gyur ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-13: mi khom par skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-14: dkon mchog gsum mngon par mi rig cing ma gus mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-16: byang chub kyi sems dang dge ba'i phyogs las nyams shing bdud kyis choms par 'gyur ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-17: 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis kun du 'joms par 'gyur ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
T02D3068:152a-19: yon tan gyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa la mi
T02D3068:152a-20: phyogs shing mi bsgrub par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i
T02D3068:152a-21: sdig pa'i las sna tshogs che ge mo nyid kyis
T02D3068:152a-22: bgyis pa'am / bgyid du stsal ba'am /
T02D3068:152a-23: bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba la sogs
T02D3068:152a-24: pa ci mchis pa thams cad ma lus par bsal
T02D3068:152a-25: te / gtan nas zhi zhing byang bar gyur cig
T02D3068:152a-26: / sngon gyi las de lta bu'i rnam par smin
T02D3068:152a-27: te / pa yang rung / 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur kyang rung ste /
T02D3068:152a-28: da ltar gyi lus 'di la nad kyi rnam pa mang pos gdungs pa dang /
T02D3068:152a-29: mi dang mi ma lags pas dan du bgyis shing gtses pa dang /
T02D3068:152a-31: sdug bsngal mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D3068:152a-32: 'khor dang yo byad mi mthun pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D3068:152a-33: bsam pa mi 'grub cing bar du gcod pa mang ba la sogs pas gnod pa dang /
T02D3068:152a-37: sdig tor bgrang ba thams cad zhi zhing gtan du mi 'byung bar gyur cig / gdon bgegs dang /
T02D3068:152a-38: gnod pa bgyid pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
T02D3068:152a-39: grol nas gdon bgegs de dag byams shing zhi ba'i
T02D3068:152a-40: sems kyis sngar gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa byas
T02D3068:152a-42: rang rang gi gnas su dong zhing phyin chad nam
T02D3068:152a-43: du yang gnod pa ci yang mi byed par gyur
T02D3068:152b-0: cig / @152b 'phral du yang tshe ring zhing nad ma mchis pa dang /
T02D3068:152b-1: 'khor dang yo byad mthun zhing 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D3068:152b-2: bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub pa la
T02D3068:152b-3: sogs pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D3068:152b-4: dpal thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig / tshe
T02D3068:152b-5: rabs thams cad du yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs
T02D3068:152b-6: su rdzogs par byed pa'i lus dang /
T02D3068:152b-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
T02D3068:152b-11: par gyur cig / theg pa chen po'i chos dang
T02D3068:152b-13: thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02D3068:152b-14: bsgom pa'i sgo nas don mngon sum du bgyid par
T02D3068:152b-15: gyur cig / dam pa'i chos ma nor bar ston
T02D3068:152b-16: pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams dang rgyun
T02D3068:152b-17: du 'grogs shing mnyes par bgyid par gyur cig /
T02D3068:152b-18: mdor na sems can thams cad kyi don bgyi zhing
T02D3068:152b-19: / 'phags pa'i lam bsgrub pa la yo byad ci nas kyang mi bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang /
T02D3068:152b-20: shes rab kyi mthu thogs pa med pa dang ldan te /
T02D3068:152b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che thams
T02D3068:152b-22: cad bde blag tu nyams 'og tu chud par gyur
T02D3068:152b-23: cig / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs
T02D3068:152b-24: su rdzogs pa g-yung drung gi sku sangs rgyas bcom
T02D3068:152b-25: ldan 'das kyi go 'phang chen po myur du thob
T02D3068:152b-26: nas sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las
T02D3068:152b-27: sgrol zhing / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T02D3068:152b-28: pa'i dbyings la 'god par gyur cig / de'i rjes
T02D3068:152b-30: de'i rjes la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bskor te /
T02D3068:152b-31: mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D3068:152b-32: gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa dag bklab //
T02D3068:152b-33: bzang po spyod pa la sogs pa zhal ton du bgyi ste //
T02D3068:152b-34: mchod de nas bzod pa gsol te /
T02D3068:152b-35: 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol /
T02D3068:152b-36: deng 'dir phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad gdan 'dzom par spyan drangs nas /
T02D3068:152b-37: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi
T02D3068:152b-38: sgo nas che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba
T02D3068:152b-39: mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir /
T02D3068:152b-40: bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma 'tshal ba dang /
T02D3068:153a-0: bag ma mchis pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid @153a * //
T02D3068:153a-1: kyi sbyor ba nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dang /
T02D3068:153a-2: mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang /
T02D3068:153a-3: mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs
T02D3068:153a-4: pa la sogs pa 'khrul cing nongs pa thams cad
T02D3068:153a-5: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams
T02D3068:153a-9: thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod par bzhes shing /
T02D3068:153a-10: 'phral dang yun du bdag cag gi sgrib par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par ci gnang /
T02D3068:153a-11: de nas slar gshegs par gsol te /
T02D3068:153a-12: 'phags pa rnams kyis bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro
T02D3068:153a-13: ba nyam thag pa rnams kyi don mdzad cing dka'
T02D3068:153a-15: da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba yang dang yang du gdan 'dzom par mdzad pas /
T02D3068:153a-16: dgongs shing so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su
T02D3068:153a-17: 'gro ba mang po'i don la gshegs pa stsal du
T02D3068:153a-18: ci gnang / de nas bsngo ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gdon /
T02D3068:153a-19: de nas rjes su zhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'don te gyes so //
